name: Seeds of Resilience
description: Ready to start anew? Build a village from scratch in Seeds of Resilience. Learn to choose the right items, understand nature's patterns, use real life-based constructions and craft techniques in this turn-based tycoon game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel core 2 duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel core i3-500 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2 Go Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
